name: BackupUtility
helpMarkDown: This utility is for taking the backup of the folder and all its files and subfolders. It will help in taking the backup of website files and folders before updating them.
author: mohdaslamansari

inputs.name: MachineName
inputs.label: Machine Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the machine IP address or FQDN.

inputs.name: AdminUserName
inputs.label: Admin Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the administrator's login of the target machine.

inputs.name: AdminPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the administrator's password of the target machine.
The best practice is to create a variable in the Build or Release definition, and mark it as 'Secret' to secure it, and then use it here, like '$(adminPassword)'.

inputs.name: Source
inputs.label: Source Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the source location for which backup needs to be taken.

inputs.name: Destination
inputs.label: Destination Backup Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the destination location where the backup needs to be placed.
